<br>
<strong><font size="3">PotPlayer最新版本，自动语音生成字幕</font></strong><br>
<br>
<font size="3">一、PotPlayer的下载与安装</font><br>
<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; 由于魔改或绿化精简等，不清楚对这个功能有没有影响，所以个人推荐在官网下载官方最新版安装。<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;PotPlayer官网地址：<a rel="nofollow noopener" href="https://potplayer.daum.net/" target="_blank">https://potplayer.daum.net/</a><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;PotPlayer中文网地址：<a rel="nofollow noopener" href="https://potplayer.org/" target="_blank">https://potplayer.org/</a><br>
<br>
<font size="3">二、功能的实现过程</font><br>
1.<br>
打开PotPlayer软件<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; 点击&nbsp;&nbsp;<font color="#ff0000">右键</font><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;选择&nbsp;&nbsp;<font color="#ff0000">字幕</font><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;选择&nbsp;&nbsp;<font color="#ff0000">创建有声字幕</font><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; 选择&nbsp;&nbsp;<font color="#ff0000">创建有声字幕设置</font><br>
<img id="aimg_cghe0" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/6781ead3d0e0a243d4f33894.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/6781ead3d0e0a243d4f33894.png"><br>
2.<br>
下载转换引擎<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; 在弹出的 <font color="#ff0000">创建有声字幕</font> 设置界面<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;转换引擎一项选择&nbsp;&nbsp;<font color="#ff0000">Whisper-Faster(推荐)</font><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;选择后点击&nbsp;&nbsp;<font color="#ff0000">下载</font><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; 会自动下载一个约1.3G的文件（这里需要点时间）<br>
<img id="aimg_cuvR4" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/6781eadad0e0a243d4f33896.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/6781eadad0e0a243d4f33896.png"><br>
ps：<br>
转换引擎下载好后<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; 点击&nbsp;&nbsp;<font color="#ff0000">右键</font><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;选择&nbsp;&nbsp;<font color="#ff0000">字幕</font><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;选择&nbsp;&nbsp;<font color="#ff0000">创建有声字幕</font><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; 选择&nbsp;&nbsp;<font color="#ff00">Whisper 引擎</font><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;选择&nbsp;&nbsp;<font color="#ff00">打开引擎文件夹</font><br>
<font color="#000000">&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;会自动打开引擎目录，下载好的引擎文件就保存在这里</font><br>
<img id="aimg_VM0t0" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/6781ff6cd0e0a243d4f34667.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/6781ff6cd0e0a243d4f34667.png"><br>
3.<br>
模型型号下载<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; 如果在软件里面直接下载，基本会下载失败，建议手动下载<br>
<img id="aimg_IgXL5" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/6781ed8fd0e0a243d4f339e3.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/6781ed8fd0e0a243d4f339e3.png"><br>
<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; 模型型号手动下载方式<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;打开 <font color="#ff0000">Hugging Face</font> 开源社区：<a rel="nofollow noopener" href="https://huggingface.co/" target="_blank">https://huggingface.co/</a><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;先在社区注册账号，点击 <font color="#ff0000">Sign Up</font> ，根据提示填写账号信息<br>
<br>
<img id="aimg_yGp62" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/6781f33bd0e0a243d4f33f43.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/6781f33bd0e0a243d4f33f43.png"><br>
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;账号注册登录成功后，点击 <font color="#ff0000">Models</font><br>
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br>
<img id="aimg_gJgFB" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/6781f33bd0e0a243d4f33f46.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/6781f33bd0e0a243d4f33f46.png"><br>
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;在搜索框收入 <font color="#ff0000">faster-whisper</font> 可以看到框选内容<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;随机选择一个内容并点击打开它<br>
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br>
<img id="aimg_x7771" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/6781f33cd0e0a243d4f33f47.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/6781f33cd0e0a243d4f33f47.png"><br>
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;打开内容后，点击 <font color="#ff0000">Systran</font> ，进入作者主页<br>
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br>
<img id="aimg_Z0wX0" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/6781f33cd0e0a243d4f33f48.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/6781f33cd0e0a243d4f33f48.png"><br>
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;进入作者主页后，点击 <font color="#ff0000">Expand 15 models</font><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;然后可以看到其所有 模型型号<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; 黑色框选模型型号 为个人所下载的<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;其中最常用 <font color="#ff0000">faster-whisper-large-v2</font><br>
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br>
<br>
<img id="aimg_Ns0P1" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/6781f348d0e0a243d4f33f4d.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/6781f348d0e0a243d4f33f4d.png"><br>
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br>
ps：<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; 各个模型简单对比（<font color="#ff0000">仅个人看法</font>）<br>
<img id="aimg_T3ZsC" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/6781f9ebd0e0a243d4f34348.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/6781f9ebd0e0a243d4f34348.png"><br>
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;选择中意的模型后，点击打开模型<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;打开后点击 <font color="#ff0000">Files and versions</font><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; 看到文件下载界面，点击 <font color="#ff0000">下载</font> 符号进行文件下载（等待下载完毕）<br>
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br>
<img id="aimg_Q8bDK" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/6781f348d0e0a243d4f33f4f.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/6781f348d0e0a243d4f33f4f.png"><br>
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br>
4.<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; 打开 PotPlayer 软件<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;点击&nbsp;&nbsp;<font color="#ff0000">右键</font><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;选择&nbsp;&nbsp;<font color="#ff0000">字幕</font><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; 选择&nbsp;&nbsp;<font color="#ff0000">创建有声字幕</font><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;选择&nbsp;&nbsp;<font color="#ff00">Whisper 模型</font><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;选择&nbsp;&nbsp;<font color="#ff00">打开模型文件夹</font><br>
<font color="#000000">&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; 会自动打开模型目录</font><br>
<img id="aimg_FbO0b" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/6781fbb2d0e0a243d4f343f6.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/6781fbb2d0e0a243d4f343f6.png"><br>
<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; 进入软件模型目录，新建文件夹，文件夹名称为下载的模型型号，如&nbsp;&nbsp;<font color="#ff0000">faster-whisper-large-v2</font><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;或者手动打开软件模型目录，在安装目录下的 <font color="#ff0000">PotPlayer</font><font color="#000000">\</font><font color="#ff0000">Model</font> ，再新建文件夹，文件夹名称写为下载的模型型号，如&nbsp;&nbsp;<font color="#ff0000">faster-whisper-large-v2</font><br>
<img id="aimg_TaN9A" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/6781fe50d0e0a243d4f34569.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/6781fe50d0e0a243d4f34569.png"><br>
<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; 将手动下载的模型文件全部移动至新建文件夹内<br>
<img id="aimg_X3V4w" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/6781fe51d0e0a243d4f3456a.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/6781fe51d0e0a243d4f3456a.png"><br>
<br>
5.<br>
重启 PotPlayer 软件<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; 点击&nbsp;&nbsp;<font color="#ff0000">右键</font><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;选择&nbsp;&nbsp;<font color="#ff0000">字幕</font><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;选择&nbsp;&nbsp;<font color="#ff0000">创建有声字幕</font><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; 选择&nbsp;&nbsp;<font color="#ff0000">创建有声字幕</font><br>
<font color="#000000">&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;根据提示依次选择相应文件</font><br>
<font color="#000000">&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; 选择好配置后，点击 </font><font color="#ff0000">开始</font><font color="#000000"> 进行字幕生成</font><br>
<font color="#000000">&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</font><font color="#ff0000">播放开始时自动生成</font><font color="#000000"> 看个人情况是否勾选</font><br>
<font color="#000000">&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;选中后，每次打开视频会自动生成字幕，不需要手动开始生成字幕</font><br>
<img id="aimg_kc6qx" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/678202b8d0e0a243d4f348cf.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic1.imgdb.cn/item/678202b8d0e0a243d4f348cf.png"><br>
<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; 另外一种方式<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;点击&nbsp;&nbsp;<font color="#ff0000">右键</font><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;选择&nbsp;&nbsp;<font color="#ff0000">字幕</font><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; 选择&nbsp;&nbsp;<font color="#ff0000">创建有声字幕</font><br>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;选择&nbsp;&nbsp;<font color="#ff0000">开始转换</font><br>
<font color="#000000">&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;开始进行字幕转换</font><br>
<font color="#000000">&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; 这里点击 </font><font color="#ff0000">播放开始时自动生成</font><font color="#000000"> ，也可以设置成</font><font color="#000">每次打开视频会自动生成字幕</font><br>
<font color="#000">&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;其他更多方式或者具体效果，需自行测试</font><br>
